title: Advise on Hiring Employee vs. Contractor
description: A small business needs to hire help and wants to understand the tax differences between hiring an employee (W-2) and an independent contractor (1099).

tasks.description: Explain the key differences in tax obligations (e.g., payroll taxes, withholding).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly outlines the employer's responsibilities for an employee versus a contractor.

tasks.description: Review the nature of the work to be performed to determine the correct worker classification.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the client classify the worker correctly based on IRS guidelines.

tasks.description: Provide a comparative cost analysis showing the total financial impact of each option.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report comparing the total cost, including taxes and benefits, for both scenarios.
